name: pfk-app
description: A template for building Node apps
author: Patrick Kirts <patkirts@gmail.com>

scripts.build:js-client-dev: echo 'Building Client Javascript'; watchify -p [ browserify-hmr ] -d client/index.js -o public/index.js
scripts.build:js-client-prod: echo 'No production build command yet for client JS'
scripts.build:html-dev: echo 'Building Client HTML' && vulcanize --exclude /*.js client/index.html > public/index.html && npm run validate:html-dev
scripts.install-globals: npm install -g babel-cli browserify html-validator-cli nodemon parallelshell vulcanize
scripts.start: export NODE_ENV=development; export PORT=3000; parallelshell 'npm run watch' 'npm run start:dev'
scripts.start:dev: nodemon -q -e js -w common -w server -w package.json -w public/index.html -x ' npm run node:dev'
scripts.test:
echo '*** RUNNING TESTS***
'; NODE_ENV=test mocha --recursive --compilers js:babel-core/register
scripts.watch:client-js: nodemon -q -e js -w common -w client -x 'npm run build:js-client-dev'
